questions.title: Watch this clip with "sound on":
questions.description: Learn about Pixar Lead Story Artist Madeline Sharafian's background and how she became interested in storyboarding.

questions.question: According to Madeline, you have to be perfect at all forms of art in order to become a professional artist.

questions.title: Watch this clip with "sound on":
questions.description: Learn what a storyboard is and why it is an important part of the filmmaking process.

choices.answer: A digital mockup for what the individual character details will be
A handrawn blueprint for what the film is going to look like
A collection of every single frame that will be used in the final film
A handheld flip book demonstrating animated motion

questions.title: Watch this clip with "sound on":
questions.description: See how Onward Director Dan Scanlon brought the story team together.

questions.question: What is one reason why a director might bring in the story team?

choices.answer: They can tell the director that they want to change the story direction
They can completely rewrite the script for the film
They can help with brainstorming and overcoming roadblocks with the writers
They can assist the animators with the 3D elements of the film

questions.title: Watch this clip with "sound on":
questions.description: Understand why it can sometimes be a best practice to draw your ideas out.

questions.question: What is the benefit of drawing your ideas on paper with a pen?

choices.answer: It can sometimes be the fastest way to get your idea across
It preserves the tradition of creating storyboards by hand
It looks more realistic and creative on paper
It is the only business-approved way to share ideas

questions.title: Watch this clip with "sound on":
questions.description: Listen to Madeline's advice for aspiring, young artists.

questions.question: What is Madeline's advice to aspiring, young artists?

choices.answer: Make sure your portfolio is catered to what each studio wants to see
Don't base your portfolio on your personal experience
Only create artwork that you know other people will like
Be authentic and stay true to the story you would like to tell

questions.title: Thank You!
questions.description: Thank you for joining us and learning more about what it's like to be a Lead Story Artist at Pixar! Watch Onward, now streaming on Disney+! And, be sure to check out our other Disney Youth Programs quizzes on Kahoot!
